tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE employee_survey_responses (
  response_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id UUID,
  survey_id UUID,
  response_text TEXT,
  response_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE employee_engagement_responses (
    response_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id UUID,
    survey_date DATE,
    survey_question TEXT,
    satisfaction_rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE inclusion_disparities (
    disparity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id UUID,
    disparity_date DATE,
    disparity_type TEXT,
    notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE employee_details (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    position VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  department VARCHAR(50),
  position VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  ethnicity VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE surveys (
  survey_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  survey_date DATE,
  question1 VARCHAR(255),
  question2 VARCHAR(255),
  question3 VARCHAR(255),
  question4 VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE responses (
  response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  survey_id INT,
  employee_id INT,
  question1_response VARCHAR(255),
  question2_response VARCHAR(255),
  question3_response VARCHAR(255),
  question4_response VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE disparities (
  disparity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  survey_id INT,
  employee_id INT,
  inclusion_score DECIMAL(10,2),
  disparity_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE employee_details (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    position VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE survey_responses (
    response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    survey_question VARCHAR(255),
    response VARCHAR(255),
    response_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE inclusion_score (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    inclusion_rating INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    survey_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE inclusion_disparities (
    disparity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    disparity_type VARCHAR(50),
    impact_score INT,
    resolution_plan TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE survey_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    survey_id INT,
    inclusion_score INT,
    survey_date DATE
)
